mapper.insert: INSERT INTO step (user_id, walk_date, distance) VALUES (#{userId}, #{walkDate}, #{distance}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE distance = #{distance}, updated = NOW()
INSERT INTO step_monthly (user_id, month, total_distance) VALUES (#{userId}, #{month}, #{totalDistance}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE total_distance = #{totalDistance}, updated = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM step WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND walk_date = #{walkDate}
SELECT * FROM step_monthly WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND month = #{month}
